verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥ח <WH5329> lam-natz-Tzecho the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת <WH5068> [Tbin-gi-Not, offer freely מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm שִֽׁיר׃ <WH7892> Shir. [or] Song אֱלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, God יְחָנֵּ֥נוּ <WH2603> ye-chan-Ne-nu be merciful וִֽיבָרְכֵ֑נוּ <WH1288> vi-va-re-Che-nu; unto us and bless יָ֤אֵ֥ר <WH215> ya-'Er to shine פָּנָ֖יו <WH6440> pa-Nav us [and] cause his face אִתָּ֣נוּ <WH854> 'it-Ta-nu against סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. upon us Selah

לָדַ֣עַת <WH3045> la-Da-'at may be known בָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz upon earth דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <WH1870> dar-Ke-cha; That thy way בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם <WH1471> go-Yim, among all nations יְשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <WH3444> ye-shu-'a-Te-cha. thy saving health

יוֹד֖וּךָ <WH3034> yo-Du-cha praise עַמִּ֥ים׀ <WH5971> 'am-Mim Let the people אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; thee O God י֝וֹד֗וּךָ <WH3034> yo-Du-cha, praise עַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim let all the people כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> kul-Lam. all

יִֽשְׂמְח֥וּ <WH8055> yis-me-Chu be glad וִֽירַנְּנ֗וּ <WH7442> vi-ran-ne-Nu, and sing for joy לְאֻ֫מִּ֥ים <WH3816> le-'Um-Mim O let the nations כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for תִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <WH8199> tish-Pot for thou shalt judge עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim the people מִישׁ֑וֹר <WH4334> mi-Shor; righteously וּלְאֻמִּ֓ים׀ <WH3816> u-le-'um-Mim the nations בָּאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz upon earth תַּנְחֵ֣ם <WH5148> tan-Chem and govern סֶֽלָה׃ <WH5542> Se-lah. Selah

יוֹד֖וּךָ <WH3034> yo-Du-cha praise עַמִּ֥ים׀ <WH5971> 'am-Mim Let the people אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; thee O God י֝וֹד֗וּךָ <WH3034> yo-Du-cha, praise עַמִּ֥ים <WH5971> 'am-Mim let all the people כֻּלָּֽם׃ <WH3605> kul-Lam. all

אֶ֭רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz [Then] shall the earth נָתְנָ֣ה <WH5414> na-te-Nah yield יְבוּלָ֑הּ <WH2981> ye-vu-Lah; her increase יְ֝בָרְכֵ֗נוּ <WH1288> ye-va-re-Che-nu, shall bless אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> E-lo-Him [and] God אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. [even] our own God

יְבָרְכֵ֥נוּ <WH1288> ye-va-re-Che-nu shall bless אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; God וְיִֽירְא֥וּ <WH3372> ve-yi-re-'U shall fear אֹ֝ת֗וֹ <WH853> o-To, כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all אַפְסֵי־ <WH657> 'af-sei- us and all the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> 'A-retz. of the earth
